\beginhymn Soul of my Saviour.

\moveleft5mm\vbox{

\beginlyrics
\itlyrics
\idx{Anima Christi}, \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad sanctifica me\\
Corpus Christi, salva me\\
Sanguis Christi, inebria me\\
Aqua lateris Christi, \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad lava me\\
Passio Christi, conforta me\\
O bone Jesu, exaudi me\\
Intra tua vulnera \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad absconde me\\
Et ne permittas me \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad separari a Te\\
Ab hoste maligno \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad defende me\\
In hora mortis me\ae\ \\
\ \qquad \quad \quad voca me\\
Et jube me venire ad Te\\
Ut cum sanctis tuis\\
\ \qquad \quad \quad laudem Te\\
In s\ae cula s\ae culorum\\
Amen.

\endlyrics
}

\vskip-88mm

\begingroup

\leftskip45mm
\hsize110mm
%\vskip-50mm
{\leftskip1em
\textinitial{S}{oul} of my Saviour, sanctify my breast;\\}
Body of Christ,\beginlyrics  be Thou my saving guest;\\
Blood of my Saviour, bathe me in Thy tide,\\
Wash me with water flowing from Thy side.



\verse2. Strength and protection may Thy Passion be;\\
O blessed Jesus, hear and answer me;\\
Deep in Thy wounds, Lord, hide and shelter me;\\
So shall I never, never part from Thee.

\verse3. Guard and defend me from the foe malign;\\
In death's dread moments make me only Thine;\\
Call me and bid me come to Thee on high,\\
Where I may praise Thee with Thy saints for aye.

\endlyrics

\endgroup

\medskip

\source Ascribed to Pope John XXII, {\smold 1249}--{\smold 1334}
